member.name: MODULEENTRY32
member.summary: Describes an entry from a list of the modules belonging to the specified process.

member.name: MODULEENTRY32.dwSize
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes. Before calling the function, set this member to sizeof(MODULEENTRY32). If you do not initialize dwSize,Module32First fails.

member.name: MODULEENTRY32.th32ModuleID
member.summary: This member is no longer used, and is always set to one.

member.name: MODULEENTRY32.th32ProcessID
member.summary: The identifier of the process whose modules are to be examined.

member.name: MODULEENTRY32.GlblcntUsage
member.summary: The load count of the module, which is not generally meaningful, and usually equal to 0xFFFF.

member.name: MODULEENTRY32.ProccntUsage
member.summary: The load count of the module (same as GlblcntUsage), which is not generally meaningful, and usually equal to 0xFFFF.

member.name: MODULEENTRY32.modBaseAddr
member.summary: The base address of the module in the context of the owning process.

member.name: MODULEENTRY32.modBaseSize
member.summary: The size of the module, in bytes.

member.name: MODULEENTRY32.hModule
member.summary: A handle to the module in the context of the owning process.

member.name: MODULEENTRY32.szModule
member.summary: The module name.

member.name: MODULEENTRY32.szExePath
member.summary: The module path.
